text: Vixen is an American rock band formed in Saint Paul, Minnesota, in 1980. During its most commercially successful period from 1987 to 1992, the band consisted of Jan Kuehnemund (lead guitar), Janet Gardner (lead vocals, rhythm guitar), Share Ross (bass guitar), and Roxy Petrucci (drums). == See also == *Bon Jovi *Jon Bon Jovi *The Runaways *The Bangles *The Go-Go's *The Donnas Category:American rock bands Category:American girl groups
title: Vixen (band)
